ComicInfo.Summary: Endgame Prelude: Ian spares Sara and Jake from death and returns to Irons for assistance. Irons begins experimenting on Tora. Sara and Jake go to the hospital to meet Lisa whose lowlife boyfriend has overdosed on drugs. Janice begins manifesting the power of the Weave.
